qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Upton General Hospital, what is the age of patients A. Davis and K. Moore?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis is 85 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Upton General Hospital, patient K. Moore is also 85 years old.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital and Upton General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, A. Davis or K. Moore?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: K. Moore was admitted on February 10th, and A. Davis was admitted on March 1st. K. Moore was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: A. Davis's blood pressure is 140/85 mmHg, and K. Moore's blood pressure is 130/80 mmHg. A. Davis's blood pressure is higher.
